title: Filmmaking now a business of entertainment: Shekhar Kapur
text: Filmmaker Shekhar Kapur says that filmmaking has become a business of entertainment Zee News 15 hours ago - Lifestyle Mumbai, Oct 24 : Filmmaker Shekhar Kapur, best known for his award-winning films like "Masoom", "Mr. India", "Bandit Queen" and "Elizabeth", feels filmmaking has... newKerala.com 16 hours ago - Entertainment You Might Like
